page.title: 19Community Nursing Services
page.content: {District Nursing Sister Jane Baker}has worked in Whiteparish for 2 yrs. She is employed by Salisbury Health Authority but is{attached to the Gen. {Practitioners at Whiteparish Surgery. {Midwifery}is also undertaken by her but{home delivery is now rare.(Two in {2 yrs.). Mrs. H. Marrison is the {Health Visitor & School Nurse}- also employed by Salisbury Health Authority but attached to the Whiteparish Practice. The Health visitor is responsible for helping & instructing Mothers in all aspects of child & infant feeding, prevention of accidents, immunisation etc. She works in close liaison with the General Practioners. There are{210 children}at present served by the practice. Her role is that of Health Education in the Community & the School - where she instructs 10/11 yrs. children weekly.
